strapiPost.title: NWA Startup Earns Series B Funding
strapiPost.content:
A Fayetteville based land transaction platform recently raised $40m in Series B funding, allowing for expansion. 

  • Connecting people: AcreTrader is a technology company that connects investors, land, and farmers together to exist in simplified, semi-symbiotic relationships. The company utilizes technology to streamline customer experiences within a multi-trillion dollar real estate sector.
  • Growth: The recent Series-B funding will allow AcreTrade to scale the platform where buyers and sellers participate in a high value market. The local business has grown 5x its original size in a year, and the continued expansion will allow more farmers and landowners to enter the market. 

Read the full Business Wire story HERE.
